ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you sure they she sells them. I ve never been able to buy them (don t need to anyway) and when I sell items, she is one of my favorites because my selling
ygData.messageBody:
Are you sure they she sells them. I've never been able to buy them (don't need
to anyway) and when I sell items, she is one of my favorites because my selling
price to her tends to be higher. I would be intrested to find out SHE actually
sold them. If so I would have bought one looooongg ago instead of fighting the
gnoll commander for mine. Or was that the gnoll elites ... don't remember. One
of the two of them had it spawn occasionally. But mine was only like AC+3 and
STR+2(or +3 .... damn I can't remember crap today). I will check later. I would
be glad to steer new warriors to her shop if she sells them though.

-Faderic

Dean Boyle wrote:

> From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
> Hail! You can get it from the leather/pattern merchant in S qeynos OR go
> hunt elites bye the bridge in BB and every now and then they drop them,
> there hella alot better then banded or even steel collor couse they add +5
> stg
>
